text: X Nine (, stylized as X-NINE) is a Chinese boy group under Wajijiwa Entertainment. Consisting of nine members: Xiao Zhan, Chen Zexi (currently on hiatus), Gu Jiacheng, Wu Jiacheng, Peng Chuyue, Guo Zifan, Zhao Lei, Xia Zhiguang, and Yan Xujia, the group debuted on September 28, 2016 with their first single, "In Our Own Name" (). They were formed through EE Media, Tencent Video, and SM Entertainment’s joint Chinese idol survival program X-Fire (燃烧吧少年). ==Name== The X in the group's name represents "unknown and infinite possibilities" while the character 玖 (jiǔ) references the Chinese folktale, The Nine Sons of The Dragon (). ==Members== *Wu Jiacheng (伍嘉成) – Leader *Peng Chuyue (彭楚粤) – Leader *Zhao Lei (赵磊) – Main vocalist *Xiao Zhan (肖战) – Main vocalist *Guo Zifan (郭子凡) – Main dancer *Xia Zhiguang (夏之光) – Main dancer *Gu Jiacheng (谷嘉诚) – Rapper *Yan Xujia (焉栩嘉) – Rapper *Chen Zexi (陈泽希) – Rapper, dancer ==Discography== ===Single=== {| class="wikitable" ! width="75" align="left" | # ! width="350" align="left" | Information |- |- bgcolor="#f0f8ff" |align="center"| 1 |align="left"|"In Our Own Name (以己之名)" Release date: September 24, 2016 Label: EE-Media Language: Chinese |- |-bgcolor="#f0f8ff" |align="center"| 2 |align="left"|"B.O.Y.S."
